metadata.synopsis: If the Inquirer of Grief is attacked, a disembodied voice will invite the party inside.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Sit down on bench in house of grief2. Attack Inquirer of Grief3. Wait

0.speaker: Familiar Voice
0.text: Enough - stay your hand and proceed downwards. There is more to discuss.
0.context: NodeContext: Some irritation (the player attacked 'her' (actually an illusion of her).
